scripts.test: node Cleanup.js & cross-var testcafe %npm_config_browsers% $npm_config_filename $npm_config_env & sleepms 5000 & node report-generator.js
scripts.filter: node Cleanup.js & cross-var testcafe %npm_config_browsers% $npm_config_filename $npm_config_env $npm_config_type $npm_config_test & sleepms 5000 & node report-generator.js
scripts.filtermeta: node Cleanup.js & cross-var testcafe %npm_config_browsers% $npm_config_filename $npm_config_env $npm_config_type $npm_config_key=$npm_config_value & sleepms 5000 & node report-generator.js
scripts.visual: node Cleanup.js & testcafe %npm_config_filename% --%npm_config_textbase% -s %npm_config_folder% --take-snapshot base & testcafe %npm_config_filename% --%npm_config_textactual% -s %npm_config_folder% --take-snapshot actual & npx testcafe-blink-diff %npm_config_searchfolder% %npm_config_reportfolder% --compare base:actual --open --threshold 0.03
